SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class Choice

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Choice
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Choice extends Object implements Serializable
This class represents an object Choice that permits the Player to implements actions during the running of the Game which he is participating.

The representation of the actual choice is given through the four attributes listed in the class. The Player can operate by choosing Tiles using as a reference their coordinates and select their order before their insertion on the Board.

See Also:

  • Board

  • Constructor Details

    • Choice

      public Choice()
      Class Builder. Creates the object Choice with the initial unset values of lists for chosenTile/tileCoordinates, the tileOrder array, ecc.

    • Choice

      public Choice(List<TileView> chosenTiles, List<Coordinates> tileCoordinates, int[] tileOrder, int chosenColumn)
      Class Builder. Creates the object Choice with the values of lists for chosenTile/tileCoordinates, the tileOrder array, ecc.
      Parameters:
      chosenTiles - contains the tiles of the Choice
      tileCoordinates - contains the coordinates of the chosenTiles of the Choice
      tileOrder - contains the order of the chosenTiles of the Choice
      chosenColumn - contains the column of the Choice
